core.Name: Core
core.Description: Managing the overall direction of Rizin Organization and any cross-cutting issues. Sets the priorities and release schedule of Rizin and Cutter.

cutter-core.Name: Cutter Core
cutter-core.Description: Maintainers of the Cutter project. Responsible for managing Cutter's sub-teams and work groups. Coordinating the work between Cutter and Rizin.

community.Name: Community
community.Description: Coordinating announcements, managing social media accounts, creating content for the different platforms, conduct community surveys, in constant engagement with community members.

documentation.Name: Documentation
documentation.Description: Improving and moderating the quality of Rizin and Cutter's documentation.

infrastructure.Name: Infrastructure
infrastructure.Description: Managing the infrastructure supporting Rizin's and Cutter's work. This includes CI, website, servers, automation, bridge bots form IM apps and domains.

distributions-and-packaging.Name: Distributions
distributions-and-packaging.Description: Packaging and assist the package maintainers of Rizin and Cutter for different Linux distributions.

package-manager-and-plugins.Name: Package Manager
package-manager-and-plugins.Description: Responsible for the development of Rizin Package Manager and the coordination between plugin developers and the development of the plugins toolset.

security.Name: Security
security.Description: Triaging and responding to incoming vulnerability reports in Rizin and Cutter.
